scripts.build: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix server run db:setup && npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run db:migrate && cp -r client/dist/* server/public/
scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Dependencies will be installed individually during build'
